data.message: Without Facebook I wouldn't be able to talk to my family that I haven't seen for 21 years

replies.message: It's a pleasure to help you stay connected, Crystal! -Rey
Thanks facebook. Im able to stay in touch w my family in calif...
So you don't own a phone?
Kimberly, that's how you check your FB...
Dont you have a telephone? Or mail?
No phone numbers and don't know addresses
Same hear since 05. I have 6 greatgrandchildren I have only seen on Facebook
My relatives won't pick up the phone and call. I wouldn't know when they went on vacation or if their dog died without FB. Or distant relatives who no one knows where they are.
I'm the only "outcast" that moved away from family. I love how we can all keep up with each other thru fb. Besides. My mom & dad's little flip phones can't see pics very well. 😝
Vlvlv v v v nvvlvvjvvvjlvvl vvvvjvvv v. V vvvv vvlvvv lv l vjlvjvvlvjvvlvv.   No lvjlv vvvvvlvjvlvvl vv l vllvjvjvjlvlvlvlvjvvvvjjvvvvvlvvvnl vvvvlvvvvvvvvnlvjvlljjvv

Kimberly Turner, and David Baker, most people do have a phone yes, and computer's to be able to get on Facebook. Yes there is mail. But Facebook adds to the fun of being connected to family and friends. Facebook helped me find family and friends that I had no idea where they lived these days, but now I do, and have addresses and phone number's for them.

Instant announcement of news within family and friends. 
Pictures shared right away. Sharing of Texas history to those new to the state (and natives, too) who don't know, understand, or enjoy the reasons why things have evolved as they are in today's world. 
People offering their family's old, beautiful pictures and tales of relatives lost.  
Love all these things on FB.
I wouldn't get to know my extended family and their families and lives.... Facebook has been a huge benefit for many thing things.

I grew up in a little tiny "one horse town" in Upstate, NY. EVERYBODY knows EVERYBODY. I tag a lot of my pics with my mom and friends that I haven't seen in years can see how we're doing. I just think it's the best! :)
